name: walking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 the activity of going for a walk, especially for pleasure: We're going walking in Wales for a week. We're going walking in the park after work. a pair of walking boots a walking stick
the sport of walking fast over long distances
More examplesFewer examplesI dislike walking and I hate the countryside.We went fell walking last weekend.You'll need some fairly tough footwear to go walking up mountains.All that walking has given me an appetite.My legs were tired after so much walking.
